entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Epic] Improve the Data Protection experience for apps with multiple instances #53654
    9.0.0
  • Error AuthenticationStateProvider in Net8 #53651
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53649
  • Perf regression: json, json #53648
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53647
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #53646
  • Blazor page route set to "/bin" causes 404 Error when published to Azure #53645
  • Flaky test SignalR.StackExchangeRedis.Tests.RedisEndToEndTests.CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesUserNameWithPatternIsTreatedAsLiteral #53644
  • http client is very slow ib blazor .net 8 #53643
  • [Blazor] Security recommendations for Blazor apps using Server Components with Websocket compression enables #53640
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ProblemDetails no longer serializes to JSON in RFC 7807 compliant casing in .NET 8 #53639
  • Blazor needs a "Angualr Hydration" similiar feature #53635
  • AllowedValuesAttribute mesage doesn't get localize because its missing its AttributeAdapter #53632
  • Minimal API with IFormFile throws when Content-Type header is missing or empty #53630
  • [KeyboardEventArgs] Include JavaScript properties #53629
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter, single_query #53627
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, json #53626
  • [ASP.NET Core MVC - Movie Database tutorial] SqlNullValueException: Data is Null' error occurs after adding the [Required] attribute to the 'Rating' field in a Movie class while working on 'Part 9: Adding Validation to an ASP.NET Core MVC App.' #53624

Closed

  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted: The payload was invalid #47774
  • [DataProtection] Lack of multitenancy is a blocker #53455
  • Re-enable blazor tests in 6.0 after 17.4 msbuild fix is in #44526
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #52915
  • `InvalidOperationException` occurs on `onsubmit` event when using `NavigateTo` method with non-ASCII characters on Blazor SSR render mode. #52438
    8.0.x
  • ASP.NET Core SPA Templates Need Better Options for Authentication #42158
    Discussions
  • .net8 UsePathBase fails to change the pathbase #53612
  • HttpClient behaves differently between Blazor Server and Blazor WebAssembly Projects with regard to Cookies #53609
  • Status code is not updated in middleware #53561
  • After Upgrade vom 8.0.0 to 8.0.1 => Automaticly restarted service is not working #53582

PullRequests

Created

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix XML docs in EndpointFilterInvocationContext.cs #53655
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53642
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix stale values from `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` #53625
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #53539
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96cd50c` to `6a59382` #53634
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53623
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update startvscode.cmd #53607
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24074.8 #53602
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Enable regex constraint on the Blazor router #53533
    area-blazor
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
